settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

Do not forget to include the snippet shipping-calculator in your cart.liquid template where you want the shipping calculator to appear. You can get the snippet here: [shipping-calculator.liquid](https://github.com/carolineschnapp/shipping-calculator/blob/master/shipping-calculator.liquid) .

settings.label: Allow shopper to see prices in his own currency?

settings.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

* For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/How_to_Show_Multiple_Currencies#Do_tell_where_the_money_is) (“Do tell where the money is”).
